svg.text: Generated from extracted text/metadata (no external AW renderer).
This packet contains release notes for all versions of
since 3.1. Version 5.0 contains significant new features. Version 3.1 wa
Please refer to either the enclosed printed copy of these earlier release not
s a maintenance release and was shipped to users experiencing specific problems
with earlier releases. Version 3.1 was only available on Sparc and SGI machi
es, or see the on-line version in $ESPS_BASE/doc/wrel3.1.doc.
